the present case should be the same as in the precedent. Plessy’s argument
then appears to run something like this:
(1) The ordinance in Yick Wowas declared unconstitutional.
(2) The ordinance in Yick Wois similar to the statute in Plessyin several
respects.
(3) The statute in Plessyalso ought to be declared unconstitutional.
This argument is not very good as it stands, so we need to add some sup-
pressed premises.
